global.invalidResponseExplanation: Node mengembalikan response yang tidak valid.
global.invalidResponsePollingExplanation: Node mengembalikan response yang tidak valid ketika memungut suara.
global.notAvailableExplanation: Ini akan ditambahkan di tahap berikutnya.
global.unrecognisedPasswordExplanation: Kata sandi tidak dikenali. Silahkan coba kembali.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidChars: Seed berisi karakter yang tidak valid
addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Seed Anda memiliki karakter yang tidak valid. Seed hanya boleh terdiri dari huruf A-Z dan angka 9. Silakan coba lagi.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seed harus terdiri dari setidaknya 60 karakter (sebaiknya 81 karakter). Seed Anda adalah {seed.length} karakter. Silahkan coba lagi.
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUseExplanation: Silahkan menggunakan nama akun yang unik untuk Seed anda.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Sepertinya terjadi kesalahan saat memperbaharui kata sandi anda. Silahkan coba lagi.
changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Kata sandi anda telah sukses diperbaharui.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Kata sandi anda salah. Silahkan coba lagi.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Kata sandi tidak cocok. Silahkan coba lagi.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Kata sandi Anda paling sedikit harus 12 karakter. Silakan coba lagi.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: Anda tidak boleh menggunakan kata sandi lama sebagai kata sandi baru. Silahkan coba lagi dengan kata sandi baru.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Pastikan Anda menggunakan kata sandi yang kuat setidaknya 12 karakter.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: Seed telah dihapus dari papan klip demi keamanan anda.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: Seed telah disalin ke papan klip dan akan dihapus setelah Anda menekan "SELESAI" atau 60 detik telah berlalu.
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Klik tombol dibawah ini dan salin Seed Anda ke dalam manajer kata sandi.

enterSeed.invalidCharacters: Seed berisi karakter yang tidak valid
enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seed Anda memiliki karakter yang tidak valid. Seed hanya boleh terdiri dari huruf A-Z dan angka 9. Silakan coba lagi.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seed harus terdiri dari setidaknya 60 karakter (sebaiknya 81 karakter). Seed Anda adalah {seed.length} karakter. Silahkan coba lagi.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Seed harus 81 karakter dan harus berisi huruf A-Z, atau nomor 9. Anda tidak dapat menggunakan Seed lebih dari 81 karakter.
enterSeed.neverShare: JANGAN PERNAH MEMBERITAHUKAN SEED ANDA DENGAN SIAPAPUN

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: Anda harus memasukkan kata sandi untuk masuk ke menu. Silakan coba lagi.

newSeedSetup.seedNotGeneratedExplanation: Silahkan klik tombol Buat Seed Baru.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: Dompet sudah dipersiapkan dan siap untuk digunakan. Silahkan cek di menu Perkakas jika Anda ingin membuat perubahan lagi.

paperWallet.clickToPrint: Click the button below to print a paper copy of your seed.
paperWallet.neverShare: Never share your seed with anyone.

receive.addressCopiedExplanation: Your address has been copied to the clipboard.

saveYourSeed.mustSaveYourSeed: You must save your seed with

seedReentry.incorrectSeedExplanation: The seed you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
seedReentry.thisIsACheck: This is a check to make sure you saved your seed.
seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: If you have not saved your seed, please go back to the previous screen and do so.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Address should be 81 characters long and should have a checksum.
send.notEnoughFundsExplanation: You do not have enough IOTA to complete this transfer.
send.keyReuseExplanation: The address you are trying to send to has already been used. Please try another address.

setPassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least ${MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH} characters. It is currently ${this.state.password.length} characters long. Please try again.
setPassword.passwordMismatchExplanation: The passwords you have entered do not match. Please try again.
setPassword.nowWeNeedTo: Now we need to set up a password.
setPassword.anEncryptedCopy: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored on your device. You will use this password to access your wallet in future.
setPassword.ensure: Ensure you use a strong password of at least 12 characters.

setSeedName.canUseMultipleSeeds: You can use multiple seeds with this wallet. Each seed requires an account name.
setSeedName.youCanAdd: You can add more seeds in the Settings menu.

settings.transferSendingExplanation: Please wait until your transfer has been sent.
settings.generatingAddressExplanation: Please wait until your address has been generated.

resetWalletConfirmation.warning1: All your wallet data including your
resetWalletConfirmation.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to continue?

resetWalletRequirePassword.enterPassword: Enter password to reset your wallet.

walletSetup.doYouAlreadyHaveASeed: Do you already have a seed that you would like to use?
walletSetup.seedExplanation: The IOTA seed is like a username and password to your account, combined into one string of 81 characters.
walletSetup.explanation1: You can use it to access your funds from
walletSetup.explanation5: . but if you lose your seed, you also lose your IOTA.

welcome.thankYou: Thank you for downloading the IOTA wallet.
welcome.weWillSpend: We will spend the next few minutes setting up your wallet.
welcome.reminder: You may be tempted to skip some steps, but we urge you to follow the complete process.

writeSeedDown.yourSeedIs: Your seed is 81 characters read from left to right. Write down your seed and checksum and
